fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Increase a player's home temperature, forcing them and all visitors outside, so you can douse all of them.
- If the Apocalypse is dead, you may ignite.
- Decrease a player's home temperature. Roleblock them and all their would-be visitors.
- **Final Thermostat Control** - Roleblock all players who you have targeted directly with either ability, then coldsnap.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In the bot, this may appear in either Underworld or Everfrost color.
- You have access to both factional chats.
- You may win with either faction.
- Both factions may choose to kill you.
- You may self-target.
- You may choose to perform a false ability to either faction.
- If the Apocalypse dies and you would have been promoted, you may choose to decline the promotion.
